Okechukwu Ndibe, nke a maara nke ọma dịka Okey Ndibe, (a mụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ, onye na-ede akwụkwọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye edemede nke agbụrụ Igbo
A mụrụ Ndibe na Yola, Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye edemede nke Arrows of Rain na Foreign Gods, Inc., akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ a ma ama nke e bipụtara n'afọ 2000 nakwa afọ 2014 n'otu n'otu.
A mụrụ Okey Ndibe na Yola, Nigeria
Ndibe rụrụ ọrụ na Naịjirịa dịka onye nta akụkọ na onye nchịkọta akụkọ magazin, wee bịa Amerịka n'afọ 1988 site na òkù nke onye edemede ama ama na Naịjirịa bụ Chinua Achebe
Na United States, Ndibe nyere aka chọta African Commentary, magazin a kọwara dịka "onye mmeri na onye a ma ama n'ọtụtụ ebe"

Ndibe nwere MFA na edemede na PhD na akwụkwọ site na Mahadum Massachusetts Amherst Ọ gara n'ihu na-ede maka magazin na akwụkwọ na United States, nweta mmeri ihe nrite 2001 Association of Opinion Page Editors maka edemede echiche kachasị mma na akwụkwọ akụkọ America maka edemede ya Eyes to the Ground: The Perils of the Black Student
Ndibe rụrụ ọrụ dịka Ọkankụzi na ọtụtụ kọleji, gụnyere Connecticut College, Bard College na Simon's Rock, Trinity College na Hartford, Connecticut, nakwa Mahadum Brown
Ọ bụ ugbu a Shearing Fellow na Black Mountain Institute na Mahadum Nevada, Las Vegas.
Ndibe bụ onye edemede nke obere akụkọ ifo, akwụkwọ akụkọ, uri na nkọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ mgbe niile maka NEXT, akwụkwọ akụkọ Naịjirịa
Ọ na-enyekwa aka na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere The Hartford Courant, The Fabian Society Journal, Black Issues Book Review, BBC Online O nyewo uri na An Anthology of New West African Poets
E bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ Arrows of Rain, n'afọ 2000

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, Foreign Gods, Incorporated, bụ nke Soho Press bipụtara n'afọ 2014; a kpọrọ ya otu n'ime akwụkwọ kachasị mma nke afọ site na mbipụta ndị dịka The New York Times, Inquirer, Cleveland Plain Dealer, na Mosaic, yana itinye ya na ndepụta National Public Radio nke akwụkwọ kacha mma nke afọ 2014.
Onye nrite Nobel bụ Wole Soyinka toro akụkọ ifo ya ("..

obere oge kemgbe m ghọtara nkwa okike na ọkwa a"), John Edgar Wideman ("akụkọ ifo mbụ"), Ngugi wa Thiong'o ("Moliere-like"), Janet Maslin nke New York Times ("razor-sharp"), Los Angeles Times ("Ndibe yiri ka ọ nwere ntị na-enweghị atụ maka ntụgharị okwu nke okwu nke ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ime ime obodo Nigeria"), na magazin Paste ("dị nnọọ ka ọ bụrụ nke zuru oke"), n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Janet Maslin, Philadelphia Inquirer, National Public Radio, Mosaic magazine, Cleveland Plain Dealer, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, kpọrọ Foreign Gods, Inc
otu n'ime akwụkwọ iri kachasị mma ma ọ bụ nke kachasị dị ịrịba ama nke afọ 2014
The Houston, Texas dabeere USAfricaonline.com kpọrọ Ndibe ya "African Writer nke afọ 2014".
Ndibe bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ (ya na onye edemede Zimbabwe bụ Chenjerai Hove) nke nchịkọta edemede akpọrọ Writers, Writing on Conflicts and Wars in Africa (Adonis Abbey, 2009)

Ndibe kwagara United States n'afọ 1988 iji jee ozi dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke African Commentary, magazin a kọwara dịka "onye mmeri na onye a ma ama." Edemede ya "My Biafran Eyes", banyere ahụmịhe agha ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata, bipụtara na Best of the Web 2008 (Dzanc Books)

E bipụtara uri ya na New West African Poets, nke onye edemede Gambia bụ Tijan Sallah dere. Ndibe akụziela na Mahadum Brown dị na Providence, Rhode Island, Trinity College dị na mba Hartford, Connecticut, Simon's Rock of Bard College dị na obodo Great Barrington, MA, Connecticut College, New London, CT, na Mahadum Lagos (dịka ọkà mmụta Fulbright). Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na akwụkwọ akụkọ akpọrọ Return Flights yana ihe ncheta, Going Dutch na ndị ọzọ American Mis / Adventures
